body: Hi Hui Ling, You had an extra Enter after your input for "lux". If you remove that FalseColor image will be produced (attached!). I cannot re-produce the issue with white image. It is usually a result of high exposure which can be set with setting setExposure to True which I can see that you already did. Can you send me the weather file that you are using? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/6q4t4dNL56kOBcBt66*mXVx-Bd2NJOmW8ddE9iHWf85oKi7QjvzAALhAyXa3HiuWjUXRbeF9618MIom01SBXdsZ4G4Syq*Xh/GlareAndFalseColor.png) Mostapha
